name: CovidCrumble
description:
We are battling the pandemic and not each other. More than ever before, we NOW need to stand united as one against that common enemy despite individual uniqueness and differing preferences. The COVID virus does not differentiate among human beings when launching their attacks against us. Why should we do that to ourselves when initiating our counter-attacks against them?

United we stand. Divided we fall.  If NOW is not the time to be united, then when? If not us, then WHO (pun not intended)?

OBJECTIVE

Guess the hidden word in each level. The concealed message will be revealed at the end of the game.

The game tries to mimic the irritating and chaotic nature of the COVID virus.

Crumble those sickening virus. Create your own smashing moments.

Where there is crisis, Christ is. In the valley of Achor (trouble), a door of hope beckons.

CHALLENGE

The virus does not play fair. So, don’t expect this game to behave normal.

Spot the anomalies as you progress through the levels.
